org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.impl

Class AbstractFilteringInputPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.annotation.AbstractAnnotatedThing<Port>
      • org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.AbstractPort
        • org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.impl.AbstractEventHandlingInputPort
          • org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.impl.AbstractFilteringInputPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotated<Port>, EventHandlingInputPort, FilteringInputPort, InputPort, Port, WorkflowItem

    public abstract class AbstractFilteringInputPort
extends AbstractEventHandlingInputPort
implements FilteringInputPort
    Abstract superclass for filtering input ports, extend and implement the pushXXX methods to configure behaviour
    Author:
    Tom Oinn

    • Method Detail

      • getFilterDepth

        public int getFilterDepth()
        Description copied from interface: FilteringInputPort
        Set the depth at which to filter events. Events at a lower depth than this are ignored completely, those at exactly this depth are passed through intact and those above are converted to completion events.
        Specified by:
        getFilterDepth in interface FilteringInputPort

      • receiveEvent

        public void receiveEvent(WorkflowDataToken token)
        Description copied from interface: EventHandlingInputPort
